original_text: He told you about his covenant and the ten commands that he wrote on two flat pieces of stone. He commanded you to obey them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 언약을 너희에게 반포하시고 너희에게 지키라 명령하셨으니 곧 십계명이며 두 돌판에 친히 쓰신 것이라

sentences.original_text: He told you about his covenant
that he wrote on two flat pieces of stone
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 두 개의 평평한 돌판에 기록하신

sentences.original_text: He commanded you to obey them
